data.title: Is Roman a font? How do you write italic style? Is sans serif a font?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): That’s three questions. I’ll answer them briefly.

No, I think we can be sure that ‘Roman’ isn’t a font. When a typographer designs a font, he/she gives it a name (let’s say it’s called ‘Universe’), and the type catalogue that includes it says, in effect, “This is the roman versi...
